short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize long and boring feed posts on LinkedIn to a few sentences with the help of AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of seeing long and boring posts on your LinkedIn feed? 500-word essays about nothing? Do you want to see the real value of these posts without actually reading them? Do you want to save your time and focus on more important things?

Well look no more! TLDR can summarize any post based on your preferences with the help of AI. You can setup summary type and summary length. The result will appear right above the original post (and in the original language) so you don’t even have to click on “Show More”. You will also see how long is the original post and how much time you can save.

We have 6 persona types who can do the summary for you:
1. Helpful Assistant
2. Standup Comedian
3. Bored Teenager
4. Mean Girl
5. First-grader
6. Grumpy Old Man

You can switch between them anytime in extension settings.
